__TOC__

== Video Overview ==

  A howto guide on setting up samba so other machines across a network can access ubuntu's shares. This may include setting passwords and possibly adding a specific user for the sharing of files.

== Target Audience ==

* Users
* System Administrators

== Pre-requisites ==

* A network! 

== Required Knowledge ==

* Basic knowledge of unix file permissions

== Recommended Knowledge ==

* Knowledge of using command line to add users and change file permissions

== Objectives ==

After this video you should be able to

* Setup shared folders and allow them to be accessed across a network
